data.text: @Politics_PR Nothing more dangerous than someone with nothing left to lose.
@Politics_PR Really? Are we going there? He looks sane to me.
@Politics_PR Nope he is just an asshole
@Politics_PR Nah he’s just a fucking nut job.
@Politics_PR People need to stop making excuses for both Putin and Trump.  They are autocratic humanitarian criminals and should be locked up.
@Politics_PR Something is certainly wrong with him.

@Politics_PR Yikes. The fate of the world resting with a man with nothing to live for.
Hopefully his team has already had their "if Nixon orders a launch, check with us first" internal discussions
@Politics_PR @betseybess Are we now ruling out “just bat $hit crazy” and “pure evil”??
